description:
Oases Chain is cofounded by the Oases Foundation of Singapore and the EPC Foundation of the United States. It is the world's first integrated system that uses blockchain technology to promote environmental protection, reduce environmental pollution, manage energy, and monitor emissions (hereinafter referred to as Oases Ecology). system).

 Oases means numerous oases. In this sense, the Oases ecosystem is committed to using a distributed
technology of blockchain to create beautiful oases in every community that is plagued by environmental problems such as pollution and emissions. The kind of distributed energy management technology is accessible to every normal individual and motivates everyone to contribute to the construction of green ecological communities.
name: Oases Chain
